subject: Baseball
Immigration and Emigration

Demonstrations and Riots
Hispanic-Americans
Illegal Immigrants
lead_paragraph: More than 200 people, mostly Hispanic, protested Arizona’s immigration law and asked Major League Baseball to move next year’s All-Star Game from Phoenix.
snippet: More than 200 people, mostly Hispanic, protested Arizona’s immigration law and asked Major League Baseball to move next year’s All-Star Game from Phoenix.
